name: Crazy Asteroids (SixGames)
description:
This game is about a spaceship that destroys asteroids ,gets coins, and gets cool upgrades. It is a top down shooter that has double shots. 

How To Play

There is a how to play section in the game. anyways here is how to play. WASD or Arrow Keys to control spaceship. Move the Mouse to aim. Left Click to shoot the gun. Dodge the asteroids and destroy them.
